X3B1 is an experimental Trade League where members close more deals, exchange insights, and tackle current challenges together.
Membership by invitation only.

Mαnifesto

2 min read


You might expect a long, formal text packed with business jargon — that’s usually the case.
But not today. I’ll keep it simple and just share my plans for X3B1.

I’m talking to you directly because I value open dialogue and collaboration. That’s the kind of culture I want to promote in every part of X3B1’s work.

The core experiment is a Trading League, inspired by historical groups like the Hanseatic, Venetian, or Catalan Leagues. I’m building a modern version using AI systems for unmatched speed and coordination. I believe this approach’s true potential goes far beyond what we can imagine today.

As the X3B1 Trading League gets started, I’ll be inviting new members — including you — to join, engage, and take part in smaller experiments. I’ll be an active participant as well.

That’s it - a simple idea, but tough to execute, and I’m counting on your support, so…

I’m inviting you to join the X3B1 experiment.

Let’s create new deals, connect, and share knowledge more efficiently than any traditional organization ever could.

To wrap up, let me tweak a well-known quote:

If you want to go fast, go alone;
If you want to go far, go together;

If you want to go fast and far
come with me!

Alexander
